Title: Prohibits the certification of any new water bottling facilities not previously certified to operate as such
Summary: Prohibits the certification of any new water bottling facilities not previously certified to operate as such in this state; requires an environmental impact statement to be prepared before a water bottling facility is issued certification or recertification.
LawCode: Amd ยง225, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to prohibiting the certification of any new water bottling facilities not previously certified to operate as such
